snippet.title: The Bizarre Adventures of Woodruff and the Schnibble (Windows, 1995)
snippet.description:
After centuries of staying underground, humans resurface to find the planet taken over by peace-loving Boozooks. In true human nature, they reclaim the planet and enslave the remaining Boozooks do to labour no one else wants. That is, until Professor Azimuth discovers a mythical artifact called Schnibble. With a revolution from the Boozooks looming, the government steps in and sends BigWig to kidnap the professor. Azimuth hides his adopted son, Woodruff just before. Dragged away, Woodruff is left alone in a world he doesn't understand and on a quest to find the professor and solve the mystery of the Schnibble and save the Boozook civilization from complete annihilation.

In classic Coktel Vision style, this is a pixel-hunting puzzle adventure game with bizarre characters and even weirder riddles. The game also features a fully voiced cast and a soundtrack.

Game page: https://retro.gg/game/the-bizarre-adventures-of-woodruff-and-the-schnibble/1889

The Retro Spirit - Since 1832
